rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{4}{U}{B}: Exile enchanted creature. Its owner may have you return it to the battlefield under your control. If they don't, you draw three cards.
flavor_text:
[i]“Cease all progress, Ajha, or this will be war.”
—Amarell, elder of New Tensuo[/i]
